ValidationRule.description: If the project is put on hold (blocked or redirected) then the "Reason" is required. Updated per NICC-030954.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(On_Hold_Reason__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Blocked"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Redirected"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "On Hold") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must fill in the "On Hold Reason(s)" field whenever the Status of the Request is set to "Blocked" or "Redirected".
